TopicTitle: Hello from the American East Coast!

Articles.Content: Just introducing myself. Been playing KSP for a couple weeks now, and loving it. I'm an amateur astronomer and science educator, so you'd think I'd have jumped on this sooner. Oh, well. Making up for lost time!

Welcome to the forums, from just over the mountains!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself. If you need any help with anything, feel free to ask questions or check out any of the resources that are available. In particular, I maintain a little list for new players called the Drawing Board.
Used to live in VA. Hope you're having fun.
